title: Online Training Based on Cognitive Load Theory to Strengthen Patient Handoff (Handover) Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with basic medical terminology and patient care processes
context.additional_context: LMS-based simulation environment replicating medical settings to align with real-world tasks

learning_goals: Learners can isolate and train clinical/communication/system-management skills required in handoff processes in a step-by-step manner.
Learners can analyze handoff training scenarios by applying the three types of cognitive load (intrinsic, extraneous, germane) from Cognitive Load Theory (CLT).
Learners can deliver/accept core information with over 90% accuracy under time constraints using a structured handoff framework.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
